results.title: Metformin exerts an antitumoral effect on papillary thyroid cancer cells through altered cell energy metabolism and sensitized by BACH1 depletion.
results.text_hl: The aims of this study were to investigate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exerts antitumor effects in @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Cancer_Papillary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077273 @@@PTC@@@ cells and explore the role of @GENE_BACH1 @GENE_12013 @@@BACH1@@@ depletion on the sensitivity of @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Cancer_Papillary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077273 @@@PTC@@@ cells to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Thyroid cancer: From molecular insights to therapy (Review).
results.text_hl: Metabolic interventions, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ modulation in @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Cancer_Papillary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077273 @@@PTC@@@ and novel delivery systems such as micelle-encapsulated AB3 for @DISEASE_Familial_medullary_thyroid_carcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:C536911 @@@MTC@@@, demonstrate translational potential.
